info.numberOfPlayersInEachQuest: Number of Players in Each Quest

rules.goalText: Players are secretly either Loyal Knights (Good) or Dark Knights of the Underworld (Evil). Good wins by successfully completing three Quests, while Evil wins if three Quests fail.
rules.gameplayText: Throughout the game, players can say whatever they want. Use a mix of discussion, deception, accusations, and logical reasoning to achieve victory.
rules.teamBuildingText: All players vote for the players they want on the next Quest. The Leader selects a team and all players vote to approve or reject this team.
rules.questText: The approved team decides whether the Quest will succeed or fail. Only one Evil player can cause failure. Choose your team carefully!
rules.strategyText1: It's wrong to approve a team unless you're sure about every player on it. Don't be afraid to reject a proposalâ€”this doesn't make you look Evil.
rules.strategyText2: Watch carefully who votes "yes" and ask them to explain their reasoning. Sometimes, Evil players will approve a team because they know another Evil player is on it.

characters.seer: Sees the identities of some (or all) evil players, but must avoid being revealed to the Shade
characters.guardian: Knows who the Seer and Seraphina are, but not which is which.
characters.knights: These are the basic good characters
characters.seraphina: Appears as Seer to the Guardian.
characters.shade: Can assassinate the Seer at the end of the game.
characters.thrall: These characters aim to sabotage quests and sow distrust among good players

tips.avoidComplex: Avoid the more complex roles at first, stick to a simple team (maybe even without a Seer).
tips.bluffingKey: Bluffing is a key part of the game.
tips.evilBlendIn: Evil players must try to blend in with the Good team and avoid drawing attention. If playing Good, try to identify Evil players based on their actions and voting patterns.
tips.evilVoteSuccess: Evil players can vote "Success" on a Quest to maintain their cover, but be careful not to overdo it.
tips.thrallTip: Thrall: Cooperate with the evil team and fail quests discreetly.
tips.shadeTip: Shade: Watch out for the Seer.
tips.seerTip: Seer: Play it cool, and try to use logic when accusing or you'll get caught.
tips.guardianTip: Guardian: Pretend to be the Seer.
